msContents.summary: Tax register, recording the daily collection of money taxes in the village of Karanis; the name of each tax-payer paying the poll-tax is cross-referenced with a page of another register, where taxpayers were listed geographically

msItemStruct.note: Due to the size of this tax roll (P.Mich. IV/1, 225 + IV/2, 358), its content has been divided in the present database into several cards (one for each column).

div.ab: (Col.) 157;;(Mesore 4, continued);;Syrus, son of Heras - (through) Imties - [for garden land] of year 13: for apomoira, 2 drachmai 5 1/2 obols; for olive (transportation), 2 1/2 obols; for naubion, 2 obols; for supplements, 4 1/2 obols; for eparourion, 2 drachmai; for supplements, 1 obol; for kollybos, 1/2 obol 2 chalkoi. Total: 6 drachmai 4 obols 2 chalkoi.;And for Apis, son of Petheus, grandson of Protion, [for garden land] of year [13]: for apomoira, 2 drachmai 3 obols; for olive (transportation), 2 obols 2 chalkoi; for naubion, 1 1/2 obols; for supplements, 3 1/2 obols 2 chalkoi; [for eparourion], 1 drachme 4 obols; for supplements, 1 obol; for kollybos, 1/2 obol 2 chalkoi. Total: 5 drachmai 4 obols 2 chalkoi.;And for Thaisaris, daughter of Irenaios, [for garden land] of year [13]: for apomoira, 2 drachmai 3 obols; for olive (transportation), 2 obols 2 chalkoi; for naubion, 1 1/2 obols; for supplements, 3 1/2 obols 2 chalkoi; [for eparourion], 1 drachme 4 obols; for supplements, 1 obol; for kollybos, 1/2 obol 2 chalkoi. Total: 5 drachmai 4 obols 2 chalkoi. (In left margin: [16] drachmai [27 obols].);Diodoros, son of Hatres - (through) Mystharion, son of Diodoros - for garden land [of year 13]: for apomoira, 5 drachmai 1 obol; for olive (transportation), 4 1/2 obols; for naubion, 3 obols 2 chalkoi; for supplements, 1 drachme 2 obols; for eparourion, [3] drachmai [2] 1/2 obols 2 chalkoi; for supplements, 1 1/2 obols 2 chalkoi; for kollybos, 1 obol 2 chalkoi. Total: 11 drachmai 4 1/2 obols.
